title: EU Policies III: Carbon Border Adjustment Mechanisms
author: unknown
text:
EU Policies III: Carbon Border Adjustment Mechanisms 
                    
                    Reportaje
                 
                
                    25/04/2023
                
                
             Repsol Foundation and ESADEgeo are organizing a digital meeting in English to address the development of the Carbon Border Adjustment Mechanism (CBAM) in Europe. A mechanism that will increase the price of certain imports, adding a ""carbon price”.
excerpt: Repsol Foundation and ESADEgeo are organizing a digital meeting in English to address the development of the Carbon Border Adjustment Mechanism (CBAM) in Europe. Amechanism that will increase the price of certain imports, adding a "carbon price”.
